desc: The Ultimate Shop Apron for woodworkers, craftsmen, DIY's and hobbyists. Made of 16 oz water resistant waxed canvas, this apron is built to last. Featured in Woodsmith Magazine as the latest in shop apron design, this apron keeps you protected, comfortable and stylish on the job.

layout.text:
Crafted of Premium Waxed Canvas and Reinforced with Steel
Rivets and Grommets for A Lifetime of Work
